name: Sacrifices must be made (Beikadiu)
description:
Commands:

To select player or move to do job: Left mouse button

To move playere: Right mouse button

To zoom camera: scroll or Q and E

To move camera: asdw

Blue player: water

Grey player: stone

Brown player: wood

Purple player: food

In this 4 player co-op game, the players must all scramble to do their part in completing a statue, and survive, before their resources run dry. The blue player is in charge of collecting water, the brown player chops down trees, the gray player picks rocks and the purple player makes the grub
